title: [P1] Harden cancellation classification in TUI update flow
description: Detect cancellation reliably from agent/tool error strings to avoid false error states when user cancels tasks.

logs.msg: Hardened cancellation classification in src/tui/session/update.rs: replaced exact 'Cancelled' substring check with case-insensitive detection for canceled/cancelled variants, preventing false error-state display after user/tool cancellation. Added unit test coverage. cargo test -q now 444 passing.
